item.title: Admissions now open for BDS course at Panjab University!
item.description: Chandigarh: Dr Harvansh Singh Judge Institute of Dental Sciences and Hospital affiliated to the Panjab University established in April 2006 is recognized in imparting excellence in teaching and training in the field of dental sciences.

item.title: Ali Yavar Jung National Institute For The Hearing Handicapped (AYJNIHH)
item.description: AYJNIHH is inviting applications for its various Masters, Bachelors, Diploma & Certificate courses in Audiology & Speech Language Pathology,  Special Education (Hearing Impairment),  Indian Sign Language and Media & Disability Communication.

item.title: GUJCET for medical & pharmacy courses on 7 May, 2015
item.description: The Gujarat Secondary and Higher Secondary Education Board has announced that it will conduct the Gujarat Common Entrance Test (GUJCET 2015) on 7 May, 2015 for admission into Medical, Dental, and Pharmacy colleges in Gujarat state.

item.title: Goa CET (GCET 2015) exam dates announced
item.description: Goa CET or GCET 2015 will be conducted on 5 and 6 May, 2015.

item.title: UPCMET 2015 on 30 May for admission to MBBS in Uttar Pradesh medical colleges
item.description: Uttar Pradesh Unaided Medical Colleges Welfare Association (UPUMCWA) to conduct the Uttar Pradesh Combined Medical Entrance Test (UPCMET 2015) on 30 May, 2015 for admission to MBBS course in various private medical colleges across UP.

item.title: AFMC, Pune applications for MBBS 2014 begin, AIPMT scores to be used
item.description: India's premier medical institute, AFMC Pune is inviting applications to MBBS 2014. Get complete details on the same:

item.title: Apply online by 13 April for Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET 2014) for UG programs in Law, Design, Engineering, Health
item.description: The Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET) 2014 is a written exam that evaluates candidates for admission to under graduate programs in law, design, engineering, health sciences at Symbiosis International University's (SIU) institutes.

item.title: UPSC Combined Medical Services 2020 Exam Dates
item.description: The important dates for the Combined Medical Services (CMS) examination 2014, to be conducted by UPSC:

item.title: UPCMET 2014 on 31 May for admission to MBBS in Uttar Pradesh medical colleges
item.description: Write the UPCMET 2014 for admission to MBBS program in UP colleges that are members of the UPUMCWA.

item.title: KG Medical University, Lucknow to conduct UPPGMEE 2014 (UP PG Medical Entrance) on 22 March
item.description: King George Medical University, Lucknow to conduct UPPGMEE 2014 on 22 March. Apply online before 10 March.

item.title: Apply before 5 March for UPPGMET 2014 (U.P. Post Graduate Medical Entrance Test)
item.description: Read more about U.P. Post graduate Medical entrance test 2014.

item.title: Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University's GGSIPU CET 2014 Exam Schedule
item.description: Planning on getting into Indraprastha University? Read through this article to know more on applying and registering for Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University's CET 2014.

item.title: Engineering, Agriculture & Medical Common Entrance (EAMCET) 2014 for Adnhra Pradesh students
item.description: Are you preparing for entrance exams for Engineering or Medicine? Learn more about EAMCET 2014.

item.title: NBE to conduct DNB CET for PG Medical Courses January 2014 Admissions
item.description: Apply before 3 November, 2013 for DNB-CET 2013, the post graduate medical entrance exam conducted by NBE.

item.title: Diploma Admissions 2013 at TISS (School of Health Systems Studies)
Admission to DNB Post Diploma Courses through DNB PD CET 2013
item.description: The test ranks students for admission to post diploma courses in medicine. Online registration for the test is open now and ends 4 August, 2013.

item.title: Foreign Medical Graduates Examination (FMGE) 2013 by National Board of Examinations (NBE)
item.description: FMGE 2013 will be held for doctors to attain permanent registration from the Medical Council of India to practice in the country.

item.title: Madhya Pradesh Pre-Medical Test (MP PMT 2013) on 7 July
item.description: Admission to courses such as the MBBS or Bachelor of Veterinary Science is conducted through the Pre-Medical Test 2013.

item.title: Faculty of Medical Sciences (DU) Super Specialty (DM/M.Ch.) Courses Entrance Test - SET 2013
item.description: Learn all about the entrance tests on 1 June and 2 June, 2013, conducted by the Faculty of Medical Siences, DU for admission to its super specialty (DM/M.Ch.) courses for 2013-2014.

item.title: Jamia Hamdard begins Undergraduate Admissions for 2013 - 14
item.description: Jamia Hamdard has announced the schedule for its admission procedure for the academic session 2013-2014.

item.title: UPSC to conduct Combined Medical Services Exam 2013 on 30 June 2013
item.description: Learn about the Combined Medical Services Exam 2013, conducted by UPSC to recruit MBBS graduates to government services. The test will be held on June 30, 2013.

item.title: Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET) 2013
item.description: The entrance test for undergraduate admission to Symbiosis International University will be offered on 4 May, 2013. Find out test administration details.

item.title: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) MBBS Entrance Exam 2013
item.description: The AIIMS entrance exam 2013 for admission to MBBS programs will be held in early June. Find out important dates and information on how to apply. This year admission is available to six new AIIMS-like institutions.

item.title: Engineering, Agriculture and Medical Common Entrance Test (EAMCET) 2013
item.description: EAMCET 2013 will be held on 10 May 2013. Find out important details and how to apply.

item.title: COMEDK PGET 2013 for PG Medical & Dental Courses in Karnataka
